EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Near Year from LE CERCLE
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr. Wang, Best wishes for the holidays and happiness
throughout the new year. Contact our Relationship Manager: customercare@le-cercle.com <mailto:customercare@le-cercle.com> If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe at any time.
